thread.title: TOWIE star takes leading role in Hampshire panto
thread.title_full: TOWIE star takes leading role in Hampshire panto

title: TOWIE star takes leading role in Hampshire panto
text:
0 comments 
JAMES Argent will star in this year’s traditional family pantomime Cinderella. 
Best known as ‘Arg’, James has been a keen favourite in ITV2 reality series The Only Way Is Essex since it started in 2010. 
He began acting and singing in 2002 after winning The Kenny Award at the Kenneth More Theatre in Ilford, East London. 
This is Arg’s first ever pantomime and he can’t wait to start rehearsals! 
Arg will appear at the Kings Theatre as ‘Dandini’. 
A magical adventure, lots of sparkle and a few surprises are guaranteed in this year’s Cinderella at the Kings Theatre Portsmouth! 
Book now for this magical Christmas adventure. Cinderella runs from Tuesday, December 8 2015 until Sunday, January 3 2016. 
Tickets are on sale from the Kings Theatre box office tel: 023 9282 8282, online at www.kingsportsmouth.co.uk or why not purchase in person at the theatre ’s box office on Albert Road. Share article 
Groups of 10 or more should contact 02392 852 232 to secure the best deal. 
The Kings Theatre is well known for its fun-filled traditional family pantomime and this year will be no different! Promoted Stories TOWIE star takes leading role in Hampshire panto   Keep in touch with local news
